Plot: "Lost and Found" is a film project for which six young filmmakers from Central and Eastern Europe have each developed a short film on the theme of "generation". Together, these six short ...
Title: Lost and Found
Country: Bosnia and Herzegovina, Serbia and Montenegro, Bulgaria, Germany, Hungary, Romania
Writer: Stefan Arsenijevic (episode), Georgi Gospodinov (episode), Nadejda Koseva (episode), Mait Laas (episode), Kornél Mundruczó (episode), Cristian Mungiu (episode), Viktória Petrányi (episode), Bojan Vuletic (idea), Jasmila Zbanic (episode)
